name: Time Reaction
description:
It is a cooperative platformer that was created and won the Warsaw Film School game jam III #wfsgj2017.
The game tells the tragic stories of an ancient Greek who went on holiday to Pompeii at the wrong time.
It was a very believing Greek and for that reason Zeus using his powers is helped him to go through this difficult period in his life.
Second player is a god who with his powers can move the platform to allow the first player to go through the stages. In addition, the second player can stop falling down the boiling lava and stoping the camera so that the first player has a chance to escape. The lava constantly chases first player.
Unfortunately, the divine energy is consumed, so the first player must pray and supplement the divine energies.
The topic of Jam was time. The topic is interpreted in three aspects. The first is to move in time to the eruption of the Vesuvius volcano.
Second Time Reaction because two players must cooperate together and as fast as they can to finish the lvl.
Third is God power time stopping (Left Trigger on pad);
Hope you will be enjoyed this game. Please write below some feedback what do you think about it ;)
